thread.title: Rajamouli launches Lachmideviki O Lekkundi (LOL) audio
thread.title_full: Rajamouli launches Lachmideviki O Lekkundi (LOL) audio - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Rajamouli launches Lachmideviki O Lekkundi (LOL) audio
text: Maverick director SS Rajamouli launched the audio album of Andhala Rakshasi pair Naveen Chandra and Lavanya Tripathi's upcoming film Lachmideviki O Lekkundi (LOL). The film is directed by debutant Jagadeesh Talasila, a former assistant to Rajamouli, who assisted him from Yamadonga to Eega. Speaking on the occasion, Rajamouli said that Jagadeesh is a talent to watch out for and wished the film a big success. The film's audio is composed by veteran music director MM Keeravani. Lachmideviki O Lekkundi is a romantic comedy which is produced by Sai Prasad Kamineni on his Mayukha Creations banner. The makers are planning to release the film in November.
